name: Creamy Vegan Sausage Pasta with Spinach
description: This Creamy Vegan Sausage Pasta with Spinach is easy to make and ready in 20 minutes or less! It's the perfect weeknight meal that everyone will enjoy.
recipeIngredient: 1 package (13 ounces) Italian vegan sausage, sliced or chopped (I used Field Roast brand)
13.5 ounce can coconut milk, light or full fat
3/4 cup vegan parmesan cheese (I used Violife brand)

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the pasta according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the pasta according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: While the pasta cooks, heat the olive oil in a large pan over medium-high heat. Cook the sliced or chopped vegan sausage, onion, garlic and red pepper chili flakes for about 5 minutes, until the onion is translucent and the sausage is browned.
recipeInstructions.name: While the pasta cooks, heat the olive oil in a large pan over medium-high heat. Cook the sliced or chopped vegan sausage, onion, garlic and red pepper chili flakes for about 5 minutes, until the onion is translucent and the sausage is browned.

recipeInstructions.text: Turn the heat to low and pour in the coconut milk and water. Stir in the spinach and cook for a few minutes until the spinach has wilted. Add salt, to taste.
recipeInstructions.name: Turn the heat to low and pour in the coconut milk and water. Stir in the spinach and cook for a few minutes until the spinach has wilted. Add salt, to taste.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the cooked and drained pasta to the pan with the sausage mixture and stir to incorporate it all together. Stir in the vegan parmesan cheese. Serve immediately and enjoy!
